title.rendered: Road Rage Against Bikers Turn Violent

content.rendered:
This footage came from a couple on their bike after they stopped at a light when they were approached by a man who was yelling at them. When the guy walks up on them the driver asks if something’s wrong when the man just starts swinging! The motorcyclists absolutely know how to handle themselves in the face of an assailant! They subdue the man and keep him pinned to the ground while others rush in to help call the police.

It’s later determined that the man was clearly under the influence of some drug or alcohol and the legal process against him continues but lets definitely give a hand to the guy who made certain that he subdued his attacker and waited for the proper authorities to arrive!

title.rendered: Is the Centipede the World’s Longest Truck?

content.rendered:
Australia is known for it’s harsh outback. There’s a lot of open and wild country between each cost and the main cities located there. For trucks to have a better chance to make it across the vast country they tend to drive only on large, nearly rail road like, stretches of highway from mines to cities. One such mining company claims to operate the world’s longest truck: The custom made 3B, or “The Centipede.” Trucks like this transport materials and resources within “road trains” that span the entire country!

The Centipede is weighs in at 250 tons and is a whopping 160 feet long!

title.rendered: “Stiffness” Test with a Pagani Huayra, Hellcat Challenger and More!

content.rendered:
Ride along videos can be nearly as enjoyable to watch as it would be to actually be the one taking the ride along, especially when the person getting to ride shotgun happens to be well, lets call her an actress of various “performance art” pieces. These people have thrown young August here in a variety of cars to test their “stiffness” as they speed along hitting turns and getting quick acceleration. They test out a Pagani Huayra, SRT Viper, Lexus LFA, Hellcat Challenger and a Porsche 918 Sypder.

Personally, we’re a little partial to the Pagani Huayra!

title.rendered: 50 Cent Ironically Showing $2 Million in His Lamborghini

content.rendered:
Rapper 50 Cent has recently declared bankruptcy. Or he’s been ordered to pay someone millions in damages depending on where you read this story. Either way, he’s in some rough financial times for a guy that once felt it necessary to film this very video. Here he has a friend film him stuffing a cool 2 million dollars into the truck of his Lamborghini Murcielago.

Perhaps if more of his past wealth was better invested instead of being used for pointless expressions of greed and pride then perhaps he wouldn’t be in the financial distress he’s in today!

title.rendered: Road Rage Rollover

content.rendered:
This guy captured footage of some dueling SUVs on the highway when their fight suddenly took a bad turn for one of the vehicles. The driver of the doomed car was apparently speeding too closely to the cammer while trying to chase his victim when he swerved hard to avoid someone he wasn’t “fighting” with. This swerve put the Ford Explorer on its side and tumbling across the road.

That road rage ain’t worth it people.

title.rendered: Cop Smashes Window and Arrests the World’s Biggest Idiot

content.rendered:
Somewhere in Texas comes this video taken by an absolute idiot who, for some reason, is convinced that he lives outside the law. He gets pulled over by an cop after getting caught speeding. Instead of owning up to his error he tries to talk his way out of the ticket. He must have seen too many videos of people going through traffic stops and roadblocks. He attempts to convince the officer that speeding in Texas isn’t illegal and after several minutes of what can only be called extreme politeness on behalf of the officer he gets tired of this guy’s routines and busts his window with his telescopic baton.

Why would this guy make it so hard on himself?!

Someone has gone to the trouble of piling what appear to be 3 V16 engines on this Kawasaki while actually managing to get the thing to run! From the looks of it though there’s no telling how tall someone would have to be to ride this very uncomfortable bike.

However, none of that changes the fact that it still looks simply awesome!

title.rendered: Incredible Redneck Repairs

content.rendered:
We’ve all had things happen to our cars that required some sort of temporary fix until the time, parts or money required to properly fix it came about. Just a few months ago someone tried to break into my car and busted a rear passenger window so I had to drive around with a garbage bag covering it up for a few days until I had to time to fix it.

These redneck quality temporary fixes take the cake though! From a wad of flashlights jammed into a dead headlamp to padlocks on doors and entire home windows and A/C units plastered into cabs – check out some of these all to hasty repairs!

title.rendered: Is a Gold Chromed Camaro A Good Thing or a Bad Thing?

content.rendered:
We’ve all seen plenty of custom body kits, light kits, and engine mods. We’ve seen Ferraris wrapped in velvet and super cars littered with so many trinkets that you wouldn’t be able to recognize the Bugatti underneath it all. In Japan there’s an entire culture of teens who sport super cars and luxury vehicles with all kinds of different body wraps and lights mods just for show.

However, this gold chromed Camaro stands above the rest. Whoever put this together is really trying to make one hell of a statement. We’re not entirely certain how good a statement that might be. What do you think? Is a gold chromed Camaro a good look or a bad one?

title.rendered: Utah Trooper Hit by Car While Responding to Crash

content.rendered:
This incredible dash cam footage from the troopers patrol car shows a harrowing hit! This trooper was responding to a crashed car that presumably hit the median during some terrible weather. Suddenly a car comes careening in, already spun out, and hits the trooper and sends him flying. The car that struck him must have been speeding when it tried to brake and started hydroplaning and lost control.

Luckily, the trooper only suffered some broken ribs. While he’s definitely going to be in some pain for a while he’s still lucky to survive such a brutal hit. Remember to take caution when it rains!

title.rendered: Road Raging Biker Uploads His Temper Tantrum for All to See

content.rendered:
Now, no one likes it when people cut them off…especially bikes and for good reason! They’re definitely more susceptible to accidents and bodily harm than people in cars. However, this biker goes of the deep end and cries all the way home like a little piggy!

He starts the video claiming this guy cut him off repeatedly but we only really see it happen the one time and it’s not even that bad, the guy just simply didn’t use a signal (which is a big no no in our book but it wasn’t like it was insanely close or anything). Then the biker goes off on a cursing tirade all the while bitching and moaning about the convertible. He gets in driver’s face, leaving his back in a turning lane and holding up traffic himself! Personally, we feel like this guy is just adding to the scores of bad drivers and road raging buffoons who already litter the streets with their poor habits. What do you think?

title.rendered: Uphill Gone Wrong – Why You Don’t Race Uphill in a Trailblazer

content.rendered:
Everyone loves a scenic hill road. You pick your favorite ride, something nimble that grips the road well and take off. The uphill is even better than the down as you weave around corners and deftly carve a great line up the side of a mountain. That’s what this guy was trying to do when he instead did everything wrong. First, he tried to race uphill in a Chevy Trailblazer…not a smart move. Second, he had no one spotting turns for upcoming cars and he nearly crashes into a few people more than a few times. Third, did I mention he tried this in a Trailblazer!?!?

The wreck at the end leaves no one to blame but himself. Maybe he learned his lesson!

title.rendered: Father and Son Drifting

content.rendered:
Guys typically tend to prefer taking scantily clad women out in their tuned up rides while they film their reactions to sudden speed, hard turns and long drifts. However, it’s this father who knows who’s really worth impressing. He straps his 4 year old son into a specially designed seat and hits a closed and secure course in his special RWD Subaru. Once out here he teaches his son first hand why learning good control and handling skills are key to getting the most enjoyment out of a quality car!

The kid might look and sound terrified but just wait until you see his reaction at the end!

title.rendered: Chemical Debris Spill Nearly Causes Horrific Accident

content.rendered: Just the other day outside of Denver, Colorado someone caught footage behind this reclamation truck carrying a very unsecured load. Some of their packages came undone and spilled into the highway behind them. A huge cloud of some blue particulate instantly created a massive opaque cloud that the entire road’s worth of cars had to drive through. This would typically spell doom for many of those drivers who’d be swerving left and right causing huge accidents in their wake. Miraculously nothing like that happened! Every driver maintained their lane and simply brought their speed down reasonably. Well done!

title.rendered: This Poor, Poor LaFerrari

content.rendered:
To own a LaFerrari is no small feat. You can’t simply walk in to a Ferrari dealership or seller with a fat bank account and expect one to be sold to you. In face, Ferrari demands some of the most loyal customer appreciate before they’ll even consider selling you one of their rarest of the rare. You have to own several Ferraris in the first place. Typically this number is around 5 but more never hurts. Ferrari dealers always send reports of their most valued customers to the central HQ so they know who to get in touch with when they start offering up the chance to buy their most powerful Ferrari ever.

Take all that into account when you watch the aftermath of this horrible crime against beauty and auto design. After going through all the motions and efforts necessary to get their hand on one, someone goes and wrecks the front end thus ensuring that Ferrari will likely NEVER allow them the joy of owning a LaFerrari again!

title.rendered: Aston Martin Debuts Their New Track Car – The Vulcan

content.rendered: The Goodwood Festival of Speed took place late June and while it feature tons of great racing there was no more beautiful and anticipated a debut than Aston Martin’s new track car, The Vulcan. It was first unveiled at the Geneva Auto Show a few months back but this is the first time spectators got to see it stretch its legs and open up! It certainly delivered one hell of a treat too. It’s got a 7.0 liter V-12 that can produce more than 800 HP and the entire beauty is made out of carbon fiber!

It’s then revealed that it’s only a can of compressed air and they’re going around filming reactions, however that doesn’t stop a few of the owners from throwing a few kicks and punches their way!

title.rendered: Road Rager Fights Older Trucker and Eats Karmic Justice

content.rendered: The person filming this video came upon a stopped semi behind a sedan as the sedan driver was already assaulting and screaming at the truck driver. The trucker is the older man here, he looks to be easily of senior citizen age and while the sedan driver is no spring chicken himself he’s considerably younger than the man he’s attacking. The onlookers hear out the driver for a brief minute before realize he’s likely at fault and they then come to the aid of the accosted trucker before landing a blow on the angry attacker and dropping him like a sack of potatoes!

title.rendered: A Guy Test Drives a Ferrari and Wrecks It!

content.rendered:
Could you imagine getting to test drive a Ferrari? It’d probably blow your mind and while you’d definitely open her up and do your best to get a good feel as to what a car like that can do, you better hope your control abilities are above this guy’s!

He guns it after coming out of turn but as he starts to lose the car he, like all people do for some reason, lets off the gas and tries to over steer which of course only leads to less and less control and an eventual head on collision with a fence. We wonder if he had to buy it after breaking it!

title.rendered: The Earth Roamer is the Ultimate Luxury Wasteland Wandering Vehicle

content.rendered: This Ford F-550 is the ultimate off the grid off road vehicle that’s perfect for any get away…or maybe for surviving in some post-apocalyptic wasteland. It’s called the EarthRoamer XV-LTS. It’s got solar panels to cut back on the need for a generator which is always handy on the go! It can sleep 4 people comfortably and even more if necessary. It’s got 100 gallon water tank along with a 100 gallon fuel tank so it’s definitely made for long hauls!

That’s right, you head to the nearest tarmac and let them battle head to head on a quarter mile!

title.rendered: It’s Always a Delight to See Someone Run a Light In Front of a Cop

content.rendered: There’s always something to gratifying in seeing someone who’s not yourself get pulled over. It’s a weird yet oddly comfortable feeling, especially when that person does something as blatantly stupid as run a red light while stopped DIRECTLY IN FRONT OF A COP. You have to wonder how some of these people ever get licenses in the first place!

title.rendered: Man Lucky to Be Alive After Falling Asleep Behind the Wheel

content.rendered: This man, Paul Yearly, routinely films himself as he drives. He typically catches the horrible driving behaviors of other’s but this time he caught himself nearly crash and die! While on the way to pick up the title to the very Mustang he was driving at the time he succumbed to a medical condition he was unaware he even had! He set his cruise control and then immediately fell asleep behind the wheel! He careens off the road and almost dies several times before waking back up and finally coming to a stop!

title.rendered: This Is What You Get For Wrongfully Parking In a Handicap Spot in Brazil

content.rendered:
Everyone hates it when they see someone who’s definitely NOT handicapped park in a spot reserved for those who need it. Whether they have a tag or not they’re abusing a simple parking assist to someone who many actually have difficulty walking lengthy parking lot distances because they think they’re more important and above the law.

Well if you try to pull that nonsense in Brazil you get decked out in more post it notes than the fridge in the break room! Some onlookers delivered some Brazilian Street Justice to this selfish jerk who unnecessarily took up a handicap spot and luckily someone got it on film (even if that film is potato quality).

title.rendered: Semi Trucks You Can See Through Are Coming

content.rendered:
Giant Semis are all over our highways. Luckily, most truckers are great drivers with a ton of experience at navigating smaller vehicles and helping traffic to move along as efficiently as possible. Typically though, it’s common for regular drivers to ride up right behind a big rig and start taking guesses as to what’s in front of the semi before they try passing. Usually this leaves those cars in the semi’s blind spot which greatly reduces the truck driver’s ability to know anyone’s there!

Now Samsung is beginning to produce a brand new safety feature for all trucks. It’s a camera system that sends a feed of what the front of the truck see to 4 massive screens located on the trucks back. This way people know exactly what they can’t see due to the truck!
